    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Card
    Immutable record representing a playing card.
    ClientHandler
    NIO-based client handler using non-blocking SocketChannel.
    ClientMessage
    Client-to-Server messages.
    Deck
    Represents a deck of 52 playing cards.
    GameConfig
    Configuration for a poker game.
    GameId
    Unique identifier for a game.
    GameManager
    Manages all active poker games on the server.
    GameState
    Enum representing the phases of a poker game.
    HandEvaluator
    Strategy interface for evaluating poker hands.
    HandEvaluator.StandardPokerEvaluator
    Standard 5-card draw poker hand evaluator.
    HandRank
    Represents the ranking of a poker hand.
    HandRank.PokerRank
     
    IllegalDrawException
    Exception thrown when an illegal draw is attempted.
    InvalidMoveException
    Base exception for invalid moves in the poker game.
    Message
    Base class for protocol messages.
    Message.ParsedMessage
    Simple parsed message container.
    NotEnoughChipsException
    Exception thrown when a player doesn't have enough chips for an action.
    OutOfTurnException
    Exception thrown when a player tries to act out of turn.
    Player
    Represents a player in the poker game.
    PlayerId
    Unique identifier for a player.
    PlayerState
    Enum representing player states during the game.
    PokerClient
    Console-based poker client.
    PokerGame
    Main game engine for 5-card draw poker.
    PokerGame.Payout
    Represents a payout to a player.
    PokerServer
    NIO-based poker server using non-blocking I/O with channels and selectors.
    ProtocolException
    Exception thrown when protocol communication errors occur.
    Rank
    Enum representing card ranks in a standard deck.
    SecurityException
    Exception thrown for security violations or fraud attempts.
    ServerMessage
    Server-to-Client messages.
    StateMismatchException
    Exception thrown when game state doesn't match expected state.
    Suit
    Enum representing card suits in a standard deck.
